policyValidationMessages.VALID_ENUM_VALUE: Must be one of the following values: {enumValues}
policyValidationMessages.VALID_PHONE_FORMAT: Must be a valid phone number
policyValidationMessages.VALID_DATE_TIME_FORMAT: Must be a valid date and time
policyValidationMessages.MUST_CONTAIN_LOWERCASE_CHARACTERS: Must have at least {minItems} lowercase letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.MUST_CONTAIN_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS: Must have at least {minItems} of these characters: {requiredChars}
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER: Must be a number greater than or equal to zero.
policyValidationMessages.IS_NUMBER_GREATER_ZERO: Must be a number greater than or equal to 1.
policyValidationMessages.LOWERCASE_PERIOD_REQUIRED: Must be lowercase alphanumeric and contain at least one period in format domain.com
policyValidationMessages.VALID_TYPE: Must be one of the following types: {validTypes}. Cannot be {invalidType}
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MISSING_REQUIRED_CREATE_ATTRIB: Required attributes must be Read/Write when privilege has Create permission. Missing required attributes: {missingRequiredAttributeLabels}
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_AT_LEAST_ONE_ATTRIBUTE_READONL: Must set at least one attribute permission to Read/Write
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MUST_CONTAIN_CREATE_OR_UPDATE_: Must have at least Create or Update permission
policyValidationMessages.PRIVILEGE_MUST_CONTAIN_VIEW_PERMISSION: Must have at least View permission when granting access to all attributes
policyValidationMessages.MIN_LENGTH: Must be at least {minLength} characters long
policyValidationMessages.MAX_LENGTH: Must be less than {maxLength} characters long
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_ONE_CHECKBOX: At least one checkbox must be checked
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_X_CAPITAL_LETTERS: Must have at least {numCaps} capital letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.AT_LEAST_X_LOWER_LETTERS: Must have at least {numLower} lowercase letter(s)
policyValidationMessages.CANNOT_CONTAIN_OTHERS_CASE_INSENSITIVE: Must not share characters with {disallowedFields}, case insensitive
policyValidationMessages.VALID_EMAIL_FROM_FORMAT: Must only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, underscores, quotes, periods
policyValidationMessages.VALID_BOOLEAN: Value must be of type boolean.
policyValidationMessages.VALID_URL: Value must be a valid URL
policyValidationMessages.IS_NEW: Must not be the same as the previous {historyLength} password(s)
policyValidationMessages.ALPHA_DASH: Must only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and underscores
policyValidationMessages.ALPHA_NUM_SPACES: Must only contain letters, numbers, or spaces
policyValidationMessages.ALPHA_NUM_UNDER_COMMA: Must only contain letters, numbers, commas and underscores
policyValidationMessages.PERIOD_REQUIRED: Must contain at least one period character
policyValidationMessages.NO_REPEAT: Cannot contain more than {numRepeat} repeated characters
policyValidationMessages.LENGTH_BASED: Must be at least {minpasswordlength} characters and no longer than {maxpasswordlength} characters
policyValidationMessages.REPEATED_CHARACTERS: Cannot contain more than {maxconsecutivelength} repeated consecutive characters
policyValidationMessages.HISTORY: Cannot match a recently used password
policyValidationMessages.UNKNOWN: Unable to create or modify {propertyname} due to an unknown configuration issue
policyValidationMessages.VALID_INT: Value must be of type integer.

policyValidationMessages.alphaNumericLowerCaseOnly: Can only contain lower case alphanumeric characters
policyValidationMessages.alphaNumericDashOnly: Can only contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores
policyValidationMessages.connectorBundleVersion: Format should be x.x.x.x and the first two digits should be 1.5
policyValidationMessages.noSpace: Cannot start or end with the space character
policyValidationMessages.urlDomainOnly: Must be a valid URL containing only domain information
policyValidationMessages.urlWithPath: Please provide a valid URL that contains a path
policyValidationMessages.urlWithoutPath: Please provide a valid URL that does not contain a path
policyValidationMessages.urlPathEsv: Must be an absolute url, relative url beginning with /, or a valid ESV in the format {'&{esv.url}'}
policyValidationMessages.alphaNumericUnderscoreHyphenOnly: Can only contain a-z, 0-9, underscores and hyphens
policyValidationMessages.lowerCaseAlphaNumericUnderscoreHyphenOnl: Can only contain lowercase a-z, 0-9, underscores and hyphens
policyValidationMessages.secretLabelIdentifier: Can only contain characters a-z, 0-9, and periods. Cannot start or end with a period
policyValidationMessages.formRowOversized: Row is too large, the total of columns and offsets cannot exceed 12
policyValidationMessages.validJSVariable: Must be a valid variable name

recoveryCodes.info: If you lose your device, or don't have it with you, a recovery code is the only way to sign in to your account with 2-step verification enabled. It's strongly recommended that you print and store these codes in a safe place.
